module.name: document_properties
module.purpose: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the assignment of properties to a particular representation of a document version or a file.

inscope.li: Assignment of properties to a particular representation of a document version;
Assignment of properties to a file.

outscope.li: Identification of documents and versions of documents;
Assignment of properties to a particular representation of a product version.

uof.name: Document_Properties
uof.description: The Document_Properties UoF specifies the data structure for the description of properties assigned to Documents.
